posts.post_content:

Hugh Duffy Piedmont 350-460- SGC 10 (SOLD)
Charley O'Leary (Name on Top) SC 350-460, 42 Overprint- SGC 2 (SOLD)
Orval Overall (Ghost Image on Front) Tolstoi- SGC 10 ($100)

Raw (Scans below):
Shad Berry Sovereign- ($15)
Frank Arellanes Piedmont 350- ($15)
Fred Abbott Sovereign- (SOLD)
